description: get_symbols TOON Encoding Complete - 50% Token Savings! Fixed get_symbols to use true tabular TOON format instead of YAML fallback. Created ToonFlatSymbol struct (primitives only, no skip_serializing_if) to ensure uniform key sets required by TOON spec. Updated format_symbol_response to convert Symbol → ToonFlatSymbol → TOON tabular encoding. Results: 50% token savings proven (6,586 → 3,297 chars for 18 symbols). True tabular format working: [18]{id,name,kind,...} with comma-separated rows. Same fix pattern as trace_call_path: complex Rust structs need flattening to primitives-only structures with uniform keys for TOON's tabular encoder. Supports output_format="toon" and "auto" (5+ threshold). Both trace_call_path and get_symbols now using optimal TOON encoding!
